mapper.insert: insert into tb_board (B_NO, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_WRITER, B_WRITE_DATE, B_COUNT, M_ID, BT_NO) values( (select nvl(max(b_no), 0)+1 from tb_board) , #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_writer}, sysdate, 0 , #{m_id} , #{bt_no} )
mapper.select: select b.*, t.bt_name from tb_board b left outer join tb_board_type t on b.bt_no = t.bt_no order by b_no desc

select b.b_no, b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_write_date, b_count, f.*, c_writer, c_write_Date, c_comment from tb_board b left outer join tb_file f on b.b_no = f.b_no left outer join tb_comment c on b.b_no = c.b_no where b.b_no = #{b_no}
